Description of incident: Trump Hotel has suffered a second data breach this year. The hotel chain is investigating a pattern of fraud with customer credit cards. "The Trump Hotel Collection includes more than a dozen properties globally. Sources said they noticed  a pattern of fraud on cards that were all used at multiple Trump hotel  locations in the past two to three months, including at Trump International Hotel New York, Trump Hotel Waikiki in Honolulu, and the Trump International Hotel & Tower in Toronto."More Information: http://krebsonsecurity.com/2016/04/sources-trump-hotels-breached-again/#...
